title.narrative: Emergency Food Assistance, Protection, and Livelihood Support for Vulnerable Populations in and around Syria

description.narrative: The overarching objective of this project is to reduce food insecurity, protection concerns, and reliance on humanitarian assistance for conflict affected populations within and around Syria. The specific objectives of this project are: (1) Enhanced food security and hygiene protection for at-risk populations (2) Protection concerns of female Syrian refugees and Lebanese host community members in Lebanon are addressed through training and legal assistance; (3) Reduced dependence on humanitarian assistance among Syrian returnees and stayees through improved urban and rural livelihoods

participating-org.narrative: DANIDA - Danish Ministry of Foreign Affairs

provider-org.narrative: DANIDA - Danish Ministry of Foreign Affairs
